content.text: Hey! I'm in a bit of a funk. What's your favorite way to cheer yourself up?
My favorite way to cheer myself up is to eat a delicious, creamy, dairy-free dish.
That sounds delicious! I wish I could eat dairy. It's so good.
I know, right? It's a bummer that I can't eat it anymore, but I've found some really great dairy-free alternatives that I really enjoy.
That's good to hear. I'm always on the lookout for good dairy-free recipes.
Have you ever tried making your own? It's actually really easy!
No, I've never tried it. I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to try it.
It's really not as hard as you think! I would be happy to give you some pointers if you're interested.
That's so nice of you! I'd love to learn how to make my own dairy-free dishes.
Great! I'll send you some recipes later today.
Thanks! I can't wait to try them.
You're welcome! I hope you enjoy them!
Great! Let me know what you think.
